title: Flicker
description: Mara Andries' life is turned upside down after the death of her sister, Lyra. Secretly reading her sister's journal, she discovers she has supernatural powers. As she uncovers the secrets that were hidden from her for years, she encounters new obstacles, some of which prove deadly. She finds that knowing things hurts the people she loves, but so do the secrets.
author: Piper L. White
